thread.title: BRIEF-Katanga Mining Q1 Sales $146.7 Million

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Katanga Mining Q1 Sales $146.7 Million
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Katanga Mining Ltd:
* Q1 SALES $146.7 MILLION * TOTAL SALES INCREASED TO $146.7 MILLION IN Q1 2018 FROM $7.7 MILLION Q4 2017
* NET LOSS ATTRIBUTABLE TO SHAREHOLDERS DECREASED TO $77.9 MILLION IN Q1 2018 FROM $230.7 MILLION IN Q4 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
